attributes.action: Remove VAT on sun Protection Products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Even though skin cancer is on the increase in the UK, the government still sees sun care products as a luxury and therefore they are subject to VAT at 15%. 
Natural Skin Care UK Ltd is campaigning to the government to remove VAT on sun care products.
Sign our petition here to try and urge the UK Government to remove VAT on these Essential not Luxury products!
Thanks for your support.

Matt Whitticombe
Managing Director
Natural Skin Care UK Ltd
